description:
The Black Candies` Counterattack: Being fed up with Chevy all the time, Blacky decides to totally embarrass the feline Zooble after what she said to him as both Mikey and Cooper decides to help him. His first plan is making Chevy panic by laying down a lot of Banana peels in the park, however his first plan backfires as he was embarrassed in front of everyone. Back to the drawing board, he then came up with another plan which making her believe that they were attacked by a monster. But Chevy knew that something`s fishy is going on with the gang.
Art is a Perfect Circle!: Coron and Panky met up with Pupu, a Blue Hawaii flavored elephant Zooble who is somewhat depressed over something. The two approached him and learned that he is looking for a model who is always active all the time until Chevy arrives, making him happy that he found the one for his pictures. But when Chevy denies the offer, he goes into a sad emotional streak, making her accept his offer for his sake. After a few mishaps and the Black Candies getting involved, Pupu seems to get much more pressure in his hands.

titles.title: Black Candies no Gyakushuu / Geijutsu wa Manmaru Da!
The Black Candies` Counterattack / Art is a Perfect Circle!
ブラックキャンディーズの逆襲 / 芸術はまん丸だ!
